templates.name: Shopify to Data Studio
templates.description: Aggregate all your Shopify data and change it into actionable insights for inventory optimization, product category performance, measurement of sales campaign effectiveness, etc.

versions.longDescription: With this end-to-end flow you can extract your updated data from Shopify and bring it into Keboola Connection. After all the necessary tasks are performed on the data, you can transform the results into visualizations in a prepared Google Data Studio Dashboard template.

templates.name: Advertising Platforms to Google Sheets
templates.description: Aggregate your advertising data to optimize the monetization of your online traffic and significantly increase revenue.

versions.longDescription: With this end-to-end flow you can bring into Keboola Connection data from one or more marketing channels of your choice (Facebook Ads, LinkedIn Ads, Google Ads, and Bing Ads). After all the necessary tasks are performed on the data, you load the results into Google Sheets. You can also enrich the data with Google Analytics.

templates.name: HubSpot to Snowflake and SpotApps
templates.description: Aggregate all your HubSpot data to further enhance your company’s marketing, sales, service, and operations strategies.

versions.longDescription: With this end-to-end flow you can extract your updated data from HubSpot and bring it into Keboola Connection. After all the necessary tasks are performed on the data, you can transform the results into visualizations in ThoughtSpot’s SpotApps.
